fullText: This revival doesn't reinvent the wheel, but it spins familiar material with enough freshness and vocal firepower to justify a return trip to these dark woods.

However, it also notes that it doesn't reinvent the wheel, indicating some reservations. | Kimi: The critic's own rating of 87/100 places this in the Rave range.
